english: Faith in Allah is the greatest strength in life.
Every prayer you make will reach Allah, if you believe.
The path of truth is the path of peace.
When we trust in Allah, all the difficulties in life become easy.
Allah is my strength, Allah is my guide.
Those who fear Allah, Allah guides them.
Your heart will be at peace, if you remember Allah.
If you are on the path of Allah, nothing can stop you.
Nothing is possible without the will of Allah.
Prayer is the only power that will make you stronger than anything.
True peace is found in pleasing Allah.
Without Allah's mercy, nothing is achievable.
There is peace in remembering Allah, and the world will find peace.
No matter how difficult your life is, Allah is always by your side.
As you walk the path of Allah, you will never be alone.
Belief is human strength, belief in Allah is the greatest strength.
If Allah is your helper, no one can defeat you.
In every hardship, remember the name of Allah, and He will help you.
Be patient, and Allah will reward you.
If you walk in the path of Allah, your heart will never feel sorrow.
